title.narrative: Oversight for effective and transparent management systems, accountability and donor reporting of UNW in LAC

description.narrative: The RO, according to corporate guidance, will focus on: (i) strengthening and maintaining cost-effective and transparent financial management and accountability systems in all business units of the region, (ii) supporting results-based budgeting, as well as timely allocation and distribution of budgets, (iii) managing and reporting on financial transactions, and (iv) supporting the management of talent and human resources.

sector.narrative: Improved management of financial and human resources in pursuit of results
